translations: adj.外部的，外面的；外表的，表面的；（电影场景）外部拍摄的

sentences.sentence: The exterior of the house needs painting.
The exterior walls were made of preformed concrete.
sentences.translation: 外墙是用预制混凝土建造的。

sentences.sentence: His gruff exterior concealed one of the kindest hearts.
sentences.translation: 他不友好的外表下藏着一颗最善良的心。
